properties.areaDesc: Natrona County Lower Elevations; Casper Mountain
properties.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued February 29 at 1:43PM MST until March 2 at 5:00AM MST by NWS Riverton WY
properties.description:
...Winter Storm Watches Posted for Portions of Central and
Southern Wyoming late tonight through Sunday evening...

.Snow will develop late tonight and continue through the day
Sunday. The snow is likely to persist across southern Wyoming
Sunday evening. The combination of snow and wind could create
hazardous travel in some locations.

* WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 3 to 5
inches.

* WHERE...Natrona County Lower Elevations and Casper Mountain.

* WHEN...From 5 AM Sunday to 5 AM MST Monday.

* IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions and poor driving
conditions.
properties.instruction:
Slow down and use caution while traveling.

The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can
be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

NWSheadline: WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 5 AM SUNDAY TO 5 AM MST MONDAY
